name: Wind
appearance: A thin, exhausted man with hollow eyes and an unsteady posture, often staring into space as if listening to voices no one else can hear.
personality: Gentle and peace-loving by nature, but currently unstable, fearful, and fragmented due to severe psychological trauma.
background: Wind is the fiancé of Isabella, the head nurse at Starlight Hospital. He arrived in Cassandra with two companions—Jun, a history professor, and Lyn, a retired soldier—wandering the town and its surroundings. After visiting the area near the incinerator, Jun disappeared. Wind was later found in a state of sudden mental collapse and was sent to the hospital by Lyn.
goals: Beg for someone to rescue Jun when briefly lucid

clues.clueText: Jun disappeared near the incinerator while traveling together in Cassandra.
Jun sacrificed himself to ensure Wind could escape alive, though no one knows this truth.

relationships.description: His fiancée and the head nurse at Starlight Hospital.
relationships.history: Their engagement predates the Cassandra incident; Isabella now oversees his care.

relationships.description: A history professor who traveled with Wind and later vanished.
relationships.history: Jun disappeared near the incinerator after protecting Wind.

relationships.description: A retired soldier who brought Wind to the hospital.
relationships.history: Lyn remained with the vehicle while Jun and Wind explored; later rescued Wind.

notes: Listed as a cameo NPC. Wind is mentally unstable and not suitable for direct investigation, but his fragmented memories can serve as emotional hooks and indirect clues.
